title: System Error
body:
Hi everyone, this error keeps appearing: **"A critical error has ocurred and and the process must be terminated.
This is usually due to the result of incompatible third party software being installed on your machine.
Please disable any overlay, streaming, or experience "enhancement" software. Additionaly, you may need to whitelist this application with your installed security software.
If you need further assistance, please visit the support website for help."**

The thing is that I've tried almost everything (even used the Hextech repair tool, but unsuccesful) but keeps showing and crashing my games in the best part (and being treated as leave buster like for three days in a row with 20 min waiting)

Can someone help me, please?

Kind regards!

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

If nothing else, it helps them track issues like this and to better understand who is affected and why, even if they can't get an immediate fix for you.

Are you using AMD integrated graphics? There is a possibility this is the source of the issue, so what GPU you are using is worth mentioning in the ticket.
not sure if you found a fix for this, but i just now have, you need to disable Xbox gaming, the overlay and disable it from monitoring what games you play.
I'll have it in mind. Kind regards!
They did and everything solved! THX BTW!
